Package com.github.grhscompsci2.java2DGame.actors

Class Bullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.grhscompsci2.java2DGame.actors.Actor
      • com.github.grhscompsci2.java2DGame.actors.Bullet
  • public class Bullet
extends Actor
    This is an example bullet class that extends the Actor class. It only needs to set the image, position and speed of the actor. The rest is handled in the Board class.
